card.name: Jinema, Hauty Priestess
card.text: Vigilance Boast — {2}{W}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. At the beginning of your next end step, if a creature you controlled died this turn, draw a card. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Quetzalcoatl, Temple Terror
Harbingers of Ruination
card.text: Whenever you attack, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {B}, Sacrifice an artifact or creature you control: Put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and draw a card.

card.name: Hematic Consecration
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Hematic Consecration deals damage equal to double the sacrificed creature's power divided as you choose among any number of targets.

card.name: The Fisherman
card.text: When The Fisherman enters, you may mill up to six cards. Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. Activate only as a sorcery and only once each turn.

card.name: Ritual of Cleansing
card.text: When this Ritual enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to two target creatures then gain life equal to the number of creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them. Invoke 3 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: Exile this Ritual. Return it to the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Bluster Ascension
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target permanent you control. It gains flying until end of turn. Animate 2 — {3}{U} (If you cast this spell for for its animate cost, also put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types.)

card.name: Carrion Doomsayer
card.text: Whenever another nontoken creature dies, you may create a 1/1 black Rat creature token. At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target Rat you control.

card.name: Relic Crusher Alpha
card.text: Menace, haste Boast — {R}: Destroy up to one target artifact. If you controlled that artifact, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Ritual of Eclipse
card.text: When this Ritual enters, draw a card. You may play an additional land this turn. Invoke 4 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: Exile this Ritual. Return it to the battlefield at the beginning of your next upkeep. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Cursed Prophet
card.text: Deathtouch, vigilance At the beginning of each end step, if a permanent you controlled has left the battlefield this turn, draw a card. {1}, Sacrifice a token: You gain 2 life and each opponent loses 2 life.

card.name: Goldleaf Phoenix
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever you attack with an artifact or land creature you may pay {2}. If you do, return this card from your graveyard to your hand. Animate 2 — {3}{U}{R} (When this creature enters, if you cast it for its animate cost, put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types.)

card.name: Adept Vigilante
card.text: First strike Boast — {RW}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn for each Boast ability you've activated this turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Jade Sphinx
card.text: Flying Land creatures you control have vigilance and "Whenever this creature dies, draw a card." Animate 3 — {6}{G}{U} (When this creature enters, if you cast it for its animate cost, put three +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types.)

card.name: Adorned Sepulcher
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") {T}, Sacrifice two Bloods: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Alchemist's Sanguilabe
card.text: When this artifact enters or attacks, you may activate one of its activated abilities without paying its costs. {1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card. Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color. Until end of turn, you don't lose this mana as steps and phases end.

card.name: Abyssal Mindrender
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card into exile at random. You may cast that card until the next end phase, and mana of any type can be spent to cast it. At the beginning of the next end phase, if it wasn't cast, put it into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Stalwart Avian
card.text: Flying Boast — {W}: Create a tapped and attacking 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying. Activate only during the declare attackers step. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: K'Eeli Skirmirshers
card.text: Lifelink When this creature dies, draw a card.

card.name: Cleanse Corruption
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast if it targets a tapped permanent. Exile target nonland permanent.

card.name: Stoneform Technique
card.text: Target artifact, creature, or land you control gets +3/+0 until end of turn. Animate 2 — {3}{W} (If you cast this spell for for its animate cost, also put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types.)

card.name: Tenacious Waveskipper
card.text: When this creature enters or deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target noncreature artifact or noncreature land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature in addition to its other types.

card.name: Slickback Cutthroat
card.text: Flash When this creature enters, return up to one target permanent you control to its owner's hand. Animate 2 — {4}{U} (When this creature enters, if you cast it for its animate cost, put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types.)

card.name: Shrine Awakening
card.text: Scry 1. Draw a card. Animate 1 — {1}{U} (If you cast this spell for for its animate cost, also put one +1/+1 counter on target artifact or land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types.)

card.name: Spiritual Consultation
card.text: Choose one — • Draw two cards. • Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

card.name: Gilded Omen Raven
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, you may sacrifice another creature or artifact. If you do, this creature gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. If you sacrificed a creature this way, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Covetous Faerie
card.text: Flying Whenever this creature attacks, surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)

card.name: Ceremonial Sacrifice
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards and lose 2 life. Then if the additional cost was paid, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Swift Beheading
card.text: Destroy target creature that was dealt damage this turn. Its controller creates a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Draw a card.

card.name: Pyre Steward
card.text: Boast — {1}{R}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: K'Eeli Raider
card.text: Trample Whenever this creature attacks, it gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of permanents you control with +1/+1 counters on them.

card.name: Mind-Piercing Bolt
card.text: Mind-Piercing Bolt deals 3 damage divided as you choose among up to two targets. Whenever a creature dealt damage this way dies this turn, exile the top card of your library. You may play it until the end of your next turn.

card.name: Essence Anointing
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards and create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Skull Drum Howler
card.text: Sacrifice this creature: You may put a land card from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. It enters with a +1/+1 counter and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature in addition to its other types.

card.name: Displaced Kavu
card.text: This creature can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. Whenever a +1/+1 counter is put on a permanent you control for the first time each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.

card.name: Resolute Tracker
card.text: When this creature enters, put a +1/+1 counter on target permanent you control. If this counter was put on a land, untap that land. Each creature you control with a +1/+1 counter on it has trample.

card.name: Band Together
card.text: Up to two target creatures you control each deal damage equal to their power to another target creature.

card.name: Temple Ruins
card.text: When this artifact enters, you may search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. {5}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Carved Serpent
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. {3}: Put a +1/+1 counter on this artifact. Activate only as a sorcery. This artifact can't be blocked as long as it has five or more +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Rot Vanguard
card.text: Deathtouch When this creature enters, you may mill up to three cards. Then return up to one target permanent card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Cultic Devotion
card.text: Create two 1/1 black Cultist creature tokens with lifelink. Then if a creature you controlled has died this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures.

card.name: Rhyel's Invocation
card.text: Create a 3/3 blue and red Elemental creature token. Animate 2 — {4}{UR}{UR} (If you cast this spell for for its animate cost, also put two +1/+1 counters on target artifact or land you control and it becomes a 0/0 Elemental creature with haste in addition to its other types.)

card.name: K'Eeli Giant
card.text: Reach Boast — {1{R}W}: Untap this creature. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control with lesser power than this creature. (Activate only if this creature attacked this turn and only once each turn.)

card.name: Croaking Sentinel
card.text: When this creature enters, draw a card.

card.text: {1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this token: Draw a card.
